segments.text: I think that I would enjoy living here , but I would like to make improvements .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What would make this apartment better for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that it would look better with a better quality carpet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can have a different carpet , but you have to pay more if it costs more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much more would it cost to upgrade ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It could vary quite a bit , between 2 and 10 dollars per square yard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think that I could have a different paint color in my apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to see a sample . Bring me one this week , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take for my new apartment to be ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Both the new paint and new carpet will be finished by next week .
segments.speaker: S2
